description:
Manon`s Flabébé was the first wild captured Pokémon that Manon got after starting her journey in the Kalos region. Alan gave Manon some tips in order to capture it. After using Toxic on Flabebe to lower its nimbleness, she was able to get it.
Manon took it to Nurse Joy to treat the poison and it fully recovered. She then named it Fla-chan in the Japanese version.
name: Flabebe (Manon)
